author: MSNBC
title: Highway pursuit of stolen party bus ends with crash near Los Angeles
description: A party bus that was allegedly stolen in San Diego crashed into a car north of Los Angeles where the bus driver was arrested, per the California Highway Patrol.
content:
A party bus allegedly stolen in San Diego was pursued by police for an hour Tuesday before it rear-ended a car on a highway north of Los Angeles, officials said.
The California Highway Patrol was alâ€¦ [+1038 chars]
